snippet.title: Undergoes // Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/3007380/Undergoes/

Descend into endless mines. Pilot your drill ship. Survive the unknown. Undergoes is a stylized survival crafting game where players navigate a machine through procedurally generated mines, gather resources, craft tools, and build bases while fending off dangerous enemies.

Developed by
@damori3604
